data.content:
The game is fixed I have been playing it I had 50 million and losing on kk,aa, jj, Jk the is crap and if you have lots off chips in your account the dealer gives you the best cards you call high on AA say two million and you lose to the other players and then on the next round you get AA again you call high and lose all your chips the game is fixed and the chat message is rubbish as pokerist are reading all the message you send on there and they block your friends so you can't join there table they lest you win a little then all the good cards are a flop and you lose all of your chips and you don't get big bonuses no more if you lose 20 million you would get back about 5 million before but this new app you lose 20 million your bonuses is 1400 hundred k not like it used to be don't play this app once you put your card details in they have got you I had unexpected charges on my visa account  and then went to my bank and they refund it but now I don't have my visa set up don't trust the if you buy one million they charge you for ten million and it don't come out your account for three months so you forget weather you bought one million or ten and you get billed the worst app ever I don't use it I use the old app 777 poker it's better and no one can take pictures off you best thing to do is use your chips up and delete the app Kamagames don't give any refund on lost chips it's a big SCAM my friend on here had 30 billion then the next day he went on Kamagames took all his chips and would not give any refund don't play this game it's a BIG SCAM DELETE THIS APP OR KAMAGAMES WILL ROB YOU BLIND AND YOU WILL GET THE BILL .
Very Ture in what you saying
data.title: The worse game ever the game is fixed and they block all your accounts and take all your chips block

Super game to play as its very addictive 
However i have been playing this game for 5 years and yesterday evening i won and went upto 1.5 billion

I have contacted pokerist by email and they replied back by saying they will look into it but nothing yet
So im very annoyed and angry

data.content:
Have been playing for months, really enjoying it. After a while, you start to know the other players, making friends all over, etc.
Was very impressed by the tech support. Had a problem the other night (the entire table froze, we all lost money) so I reported to the App support, and got an answer very quickly - and the cash lost refunded. That doesn't happen often with most apps - very good customer service.
data.title: Very enjoyable, great support

data.content:
downloaded the game after many year on new device . after buying 10m from the game site I reached 800m in 2 day and they frizzed my acc. I tried again in guest mode and after 9 days I reach 1b. same thing happened again . Frozen account. tables not found. genius wins against people that like to play all in. u win than you end up with a frozen account. use to be a good poker app few years back. no it's the worst app possible in AppStore . they take your money, you lose your time and u leave in anger. 
this app should be frozen itself in AppStore . choose another app. anything to do with pokerist( pokerist for tango, pokerist MU) will waste of time. and so many setups. your aa won't win vs  23 cards. all high cards lose. and it's magic how your cards are in flop if you fold.
booooooo fix your game and let people enjoy. just because hand full of bad people play in it we all suffer.
data.title: vvvv bad app

data.content: It's hard to believe but look at the many players saying the same thing. Play long enough & you will see how it is fixed. Try folding with poor cards & watch your dream cards appear by magic almost every single time. Get too much money? Impossible hands will beat your great one. I guess because it's not real money it's not illegal, just a massive waste of your time. They want you to buy coins. Go elsewhere to enjoy a real game experience

data.content:
I really like this poker version however, I was encouraged to purchase 5m chips for $6.99 and receive 15m as a special offer, I took the offer but only received 5m. I sent a number of emails and supplied all the information they requested but did not receive the extra 10m.

This is a really poor way to deal with customers, to make an offer and then not deliver on it is sharp practice.

I shall beware of future offers from Kama Games

data.title: Poker

data.content: I downloaded this app as it was in the top 100 and this is a brilliant app! You'll be hooked! It free and you get a free amount of cash to start playing, with the option to purchase more chips but you won't need to, if you bet wisely but that choice is yours. There's a tutorial to get you started and once you start playing, you get wise to it. Select your difficulty, buy in's, speed of game and desired table from the lobby. You can also personalise your profile to give yourself personality and presence at the virtual table. With regard to a previous reviewer who stated that it's rigged? I really can't see how? I've played over 300 hands on this and it isn't rigged, everyone has a different hand to play! Wait for your hand and bet wisely...that's Poker! A bad practitioner, always blames his tools! ;-)
data.title: If you like Poker or want to learn how to play...

data.content: I like this app and have found it quite addictive. I'm not totally convinced however that the cards are totally random. There seem to be a very high proportion of hands won with flushes and straights. I also have the suspicion that as your level in the game increases you are dealt an increasing number of hands containing junk and fewer picture cards. Nevertheless this is a good game and as a beginner to poker I found it quite easy to get into.

I just love pokerist it is the best app and I have tested all app on poker games available on my iPhone and iPad but nothing compare to it.
Just I get a little bit upset when I have exactly the same cards as my fellow players " my fellow player wins with a couple one ace, and I have exactly the same I called the same amounts of chips, but he wins and I lose with the same cards, that makes me think 
1) he must be a special player
2) Pokerist doesn't like me
3) the application it's faulty at times sometimes very often, but beside it I love it 
Thank you
Annabella

data.content: This app is now worse than ever it was all good at first but now it's a joke. It is set to take all your chips after a billion and then sticks you on the Asian server so you can't talk to friends. It's a joke time to find a new poker app.
data.title: Joker

data.content:
If u want an app that when u make some 45billion then email for help with an issue, only to have the idiots remove all your chips then this is the app for you.
The deck and card delivery system is blatantly rigged so sometimes no matter what u just won't win.
3 seperate servers so after u make friends, chances r they will be on a desperate server eventually so u can't play with them
People who buy chips have the deck stacked against them because the developers know they are likely to buy more
If u bet high and lose a few hands or fold the app automatically thinks your cheating and moves u to another server where u can't invite friends to play

Download ZEDA POKER, very similar layout and fairer card delivery
data.title: Blatant money grabbing scheme

data.content: The game is rigged, but it is good fun, all they want is people to pay for chips, which is not a bad thing, as it brings the games into another level, just be sensible when paying for chips.

data.content: This game is so fixed it's unbelieveable if u have chips then alls gd but when u only got a few then u have no chance of winnin the cards r set up n force u to play only the Arabs seem to win n the three servers r even worst u should be able to play who u want to n if uve won chips then help friends out without been penalized for it it's all wrong
data.title: Fixed

data.content:
This was a joke before the update.. The cards always seem fixed as every hand somebody gets a straight or flush or higher in real poker you spend most time betting over pairs or 2 pair but it was fun once you adjusted to the fixed cards but now the update has ruined the layout and 2 table features but the worst is I loved the knockout tournaments which have gone :( so now there's no choice but to play standard poker.. BORING!! Thankfully I haven't spent real money I can just delete and go play-> big fish casino which is so much better 


data.content:
Woke up one day opened pokerist and my 90 bio are gone. 
Im shocked. Game is obviously fixed. Get pokerstars and play for real. At least u will find less fools and fishermen.
data.title: Great poker robbery

data.content:
I can't give this more than 3 because it drops connection way too often. Regardless of whether you are on 3G or wi-fi. I have lost loads of money on good hands I was certain to win.
Otherwise it has a user friendly and nice interface.
data.title: Too many dropped connections

data.content: Can't put this down, now I understand how people get problems, lucky it's not real money
